name: Metal Hardener
description: Ingredient used by Dwarves. It is specifically designed to be used to create C-grade items. Available in general stores

name: Seed: Chilly Cobol
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Innadril area and it will bear the fruit of the Chilly Cobol. For best results, a level 29-39 character must plant it on a level 29-39 monster

name: Seed: Blue Cobol
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Innadril area and it will bear the fruit of the Blue Cobol. For best results, a level 32-42 character must plant it on a level 32-42 monster

name: Seed: Thorn Cobol
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Innadril area and it will bear the fruit of the Thorn Cobol. For best results, a level 35-45 character must plant it on a level 35-45 monster

name: White Fabric
description: A large piece of white cloth given by Magister Hanellin. Kill Guardian Angels and Seal Angels and soak the cloth with their blood

name: Keshanberk*Keshanberk
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of a dualsword will increase more significantly than that of one-handed or fist weapon. When enchanted to 4 or more, Atk. Spd. will increase by 8%. Inflicts additional damage to target during PvP

name: Mystery Potion
description: Legend says that if you drink this potion your head will grow larger! Believe it if you will!\0

name: Facelifting Potion - A
description: A beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type A. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen

name: Facelifting Potion - B
description: A beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type B. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen

name: Facelifting Potion - C
description: A beauty potion that changes one's facial appearance to Type C. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen

description: A beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type A. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen

name: Dye Potion - D
description: A beauty potion that changes one's hair color to Type D. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen. Cannot be used by Kamaels

description: A beauty potion that changes one's hair style to Type A. May be used by either male or female characters. The results may be viewed on the Character Creation Screen
